alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 02 at 3:06PM MDT until November 05 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Heavy snow is possible for all elevations through midday Friday. Heavy snow possible for high elevations through Saturday morning. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches possible below 4000 feet. Accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible above 4000 feet, including Lolo Pass. The highest terrain could see up to 2 feet of snow. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Periods of heavy snow could lead to hazardous driving conditions. Wet, heavy snow will also increase the risk of tree limb and power line damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
